content: I've reproduced this issue on Safari 15.6. It seems to be related to the form validation library we're using. Will investigate further.
Also confirmed on Safari 16.1. The issue doesn't appear on Safari Technology Preview, so it might be version-specific.
Working on implementing responsive chart components. Should have a fix ready by end of week.
Memory leak fix has been deployed to staging. Testing shows significant improvement in memory usage patterns.
Found the root cause - search indexing is not properly handling partial matches. Implementing a new search algorithm.
Fixed by updating localStorage handling. Dark mode preference now persists correctly across sessions.
Investigating API performance during peak hours. Initial analysis suggests database connection pooling issues.
Email service configuration has been updated. Testing shows notifications are now sending correctly for high priority tickets.
iOS Safari date handling requires special handling. Implementing a polyfill for consistent behavior across browsers.
CDN configuration has been fixed. Avatar images are now loading properly with fallback handling.
